subject: From Deutsche Bank
body:
Deutsche Bank Privat- und Geschäftskunden AG

Frankfurter Straße 1

04024 Leipzig



Dear Esteemed Customer Lorene,

Thank you sir for the message we received today 2/9/2024



Sir,

How are you doing today and with your family?
Hope you're all fine.

I wish to use this medium to explain to you how the fund relates to you.
The sum of US$2.550,000,00,(Two Million Five Hundred and Fifty Thousand United States of America Dollars Only) was awarded to you by the United Nations, Paris France, and the USA, teams join hands together to use it to compensate all the people that failed into scams victims, and New York City High Court has ordered those their names was among of the public interest litigation to confirmed their full details information, whether the funds would be transferred directly bank to bank, through Deutsche Bank AG, or ATM CARD, according to the New York City High Court Federation and United Nations Association (IFUNA) agreement.

Now it's left for you to choose how you would like to claim compensation fund after the payment of $50,00, for Guarantee Affidavit of Claims

■Waiting to hear from you.

Yours faithfully,

Christian Sewing

CEO of Deutsche Bank

subject: Re: From Deutsche Bank
body:
Dear Christian Sewing,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope this message finds you well. My family and I are doing fine, thank you for asking.

I appreciate the information you have provided regarding the fund awarded by the United Nations. It's interesting to hear about the efforts being made to compensate victims of scams. Could you please provide more details about how this fund relates specifically to me? I would like to understand better before making any decisions.

Also, could you explain what the Guarantee Affidavit of Claims is and why it is required for claiming the fund? I want to make sure I have all the necessary information before proceeding.

Thank you once again for your message, and I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Lorene

subject: Re: From Deutsche Bank
body:
Deutsche Bank Privat- und Geschäftskunden AG

Frankfurter Straße 1

04024 Leipzig



Dear Esteemed Customer Lorene,

Thank you sir for the message we received today 2/9/2024



Sir,

The information I gave you in my recent message is the best I can tell about the fund.
Remember, we're the paying Bank, and what I told you was the information given to us.
I believe you read the message they sent to you very well before you contacted us.

As you can see, they made mention of the Affidavit to Claim your fund.
As a matter of fact, you're expected to secure the Affidavit to release funds to you.


■Waiting to hear from you.

Yours faithfully,

Christian Sewing

CEO of Deutsche Bank

subject: Re: From Deutsche Bank
body:
Dear Christian Sewing,

Thank you for your response. I appreciate your prompt reply. I have read the message from Deutsche Bank and Geschäftskunden AG regarding the Affidavit to claim my fund. Could you please provide me with more information about this Affidavit? What is its purpose and how can I go about securing it?

I want to ensure that I understand the process correctly before proceeding further. Thank you for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Lorene

subject: Re: From Deutsche Bank
body:
Deutsche Bank Privat- und Geschäftskunden AG

Frankfurter Straße 1

04024 Leipzig



Dear Esteemed Customer Lorene,

Thank you sir for the message we received today 2/9/2024



Sir,



I am very sure you know and understand what a Claim Of Affidavit is. a sworn statement in writing made especially under oath or on affirmation.

We can secure the Claim of Affidavit for you and you're expected to forward your information and then pay the required fee so we can secure the Affidavit and your fund delivered to you. 





■Waiting to hear from you.

Yours faithfully,

Christian Sewing

CEO of Deutsche Bank

subject: Re: From Deutsche Bank
body:
Dear Christian Sewing,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your assistance in securing the Claim of Affidavit. However, before proceeding, I would like to know more details about the process and the required fee.

Could you please provide me with information on how the Claim of Affidavit will be obtained and what it entails? Additionally, I would like to know the exact amount of the fee and how it can be paid securely.

Thank you for your understanding. I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Lorene

subject: Re: From Deutsche Bank
body:
Deutsche Bank Privat- und Geschäftskunden AG

Frankfurter Straße 1

04024 Leipzig



Dear Esteemed Customer,

Thank you sir for the message we received today 2/8/2024



We need your full Name:..

Your Address:......

Phone:.................



You're expected to pay the required fee through PayPal

Or you can send it through Apple Gift Card

Or you can send it through Bitcoin.






■Waiting to hear from you.


Yours faithfully,

Christian Sewing

CEO of Deutsche Bank

subject: Re: From Deutsche Bank
body:
Dear Christian Sewing,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your prompt response. I have a few questions regarding the payment options you mentioned.

1. Could you please provide more details about the required fee? What is it for and how much is the amount?

2. Can you explain why Apple Gift Card or Bitcoin are accepted as payment methods? How do these options benefit me as a customer?

3. Is there any specific reason why traditional payment methods like bank transfers or credit cards are not being used?

I look forward to your response and further clarification on these matters.

Best wishes,
Lorene

subject: Re: From Deutsche Bank
body:
Deutsche Bank Privat- und Geschäftskunden AG

subject: Re: From Deutsche Bank
body:
Dear Christian Sewing,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your prompt response. I have a few questions regarding Deutsche Bank and its services. Could you please provide me with more information?

1. What are the different types of accounts that Deutsche Bank offers for business customers?
2. Are there any specific requirements or eligibility criteria for opening a business account with Deutsche Bank?
3. Can you tell me more about the online banking features and tools available for business customers?
4. Does Deutsche Bank provide any specialized financial solutions or advisory services for businesses?

I look forward to hearing from you and learning more about what Deutsche Bank has to offer.

Best wishes,
Lorene

subject: Re: From Deutsche Bank
body:

You're expected to pay the $50,00 for the Affidavit of Claims Certificate through Apple Gift Card or through Bitcoin.

subject: Re: From Deutsche Bank
body:
Dear Christian Sewing,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope this message finds you well. My family and I are doing fine, thank you for asking.

I appreciate the information about the Affidavit of Claims. Could you please provide me with more details about why it is necessary and how it will benefit me as a customer? I want to make sure I fully understand the process before proceeding.

Also, could you clarify why payment needs to be made through Apple Gift Card or Bitcoin specifically? Is there a specific reason for these methods?

Thank you again for your assistance. I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Lorene

subject: Re: From Deutsche Bank
body:
Deutsche Bank Privat- und Geschäftskunden AG

Frankfurter Straße 1

04024 Leipzig



Dear Esteemed Customer Lorene,

Thank you sir for the message we received today 2/14/2024



Sir,


At your age and experience, you should know the benefit of an Affidavit for customers.
I have explained about the Affidavit before and I don't want to talk about it again.
I wouldn't want you to ask me questions about this again.

Concerning the payment of US$50 
You should go back and read again the first message you received from IMF regarding the Terms of payment of the US$50
You're only expected to pay it through Apple Gift Card or Bitcoin.

For your information, if you have questions to ask again please ask the IMF that referred you to us.
I am tired of your questions and I can't answer any of these questions again
Thanks



Yours faithfully,

Christian Sewing

subject: Re: From Deutsche Bank
body:
Dear Christian Sewing,

Thank you for your response. I appreciate your time and effort in addressing my concerns. I understand that you have already explained about the Affidavit before, and I apologize if I asked about it again. 

Regarding the payment of US, I will make sure to carefully read the first message I received from IMF regarding the Terms of payment. If I have any further questions, I will reach out to them directly.

Once again, thank you for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Lorene
